attributes.action: Improve migration patrols on the Kent Coastline and the current migrant crisis.
attributes.background: We are doing this petition because the migrant crisis is getting out of control. From November 2018 to January 2019 nearly 200 immigrants crossed the English channel.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take to improve patrols on the Kent Coastline.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the action you would the UK Government or Parliament to take.
